member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.AssignmentOperators.None
member.summary: Disable all the assignment operators

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.AssignmentOperators.AssignmentEqual
member.summary: Enable the assignment equal operator

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.AssignmentOperators.All
member.summary: Enable all assignment operators

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.LanguageConstants.CSharpPrimitiveTypes
member.summary: Primitive types alias (string, int, ...)

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.LanguageConstants.CommonTypes
member.summary: Common .NET Types (Math, Convert, Enumerable)

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.LanguageConstants.Literals
member.summary: true, false, null

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.ParserArguments.TryGetParameters(System.String,System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression@)
member.summary: Get the parameter and mark is as used.

member.name: P:DynamicExpresso.ReferenceType.Name
member.summary: Public name that must be used in the expression.

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.InterpreterOptions.PrimitiveTypes
member.summary: Load primitive types like 'string', 'double', 'int', 'DateTime', 'Guid', ... See also LanguageConstants.CSharpPrimitiveTypes and LanguageConstants.PrimitiveTypes

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.InterpreterOptions.SystemKeywords
member.summary: Load system keywords like 'true', 'false', 'null'. See also LanguageConstants.Literals.

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.InterpreterOptions.CommonTypes
member.summary: Load common types like 'System.Math', 'System.Convert', 'System.Linq.Enumerable'. See also LanguageConstants.CommonTypes.

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.InterpreterOptions.CaseInsensitive
member.summary: Variables and parameters names are case insensitive.

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.InterpreterOptions.Default
member.summary: Load all default configurations: PrimitiveTypes + SystemKeywords + CommonTypes

member.name: F:DynamicExpresso.InterpreterOptions.DefaultCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Load all default configurations: PrimitiveTypes + SystemKeywords + CommonTypes + CaseInsensitive

member.name: T:DynamicExpresso.Lambda
member.summary: Represents a lambda expression that can be invoked. This class is thread safe.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Lambda.Invoke(System.Object[])
member.summary: Invoke the expression with the given parameters values.
member.param: Order of parameters must be the same of the parameters used during parse (DeclaredParameters).

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Lambda.Compile``1
member.summary: Generate the given delegate by compiling the lambda expression.
member.typeparam: The delegate to generate. Delegate parameters must match the one defined when creating the expression, see UsedParameters.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Lambda.LambdaExpression``1
member.summary: Generate a lambda expression.
member.typeparam: The delegate to generate. Delegate parameters must match the one defined when creating the expression, see UsedParameters.

member.name: P:DynamicExpresso.Lambda.Parameters
member.summary: Gets the parameters actually used in the expression parsed.

member.name: P:DynamicExpresso.Lambda.UsedParameters
member.summary: Gets the parameters actually used in the expression parsed.

member.name: P:DynamicExpresso.Lambda.DeclaredParameters
member.summary: Gets the parameters declared when parsing the expression.

member.name: T:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter
member.summary: Class used to parse and compile a text expression into an Expression or a Delegate that can be invoked. Expression are written using a subset of C# syntax. Only get properties, Parse and Eval methods are thread safe.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Interpreter using InterpreterOptions.Default.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.#ctor(DynamicExpresso.InterpreterOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new Interpreter using the specified options.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.EnableAssignment(DynamicExpresso.AssignmentOperators)
member.summary: Allows to enable/disable assignment operators. For security when expression are generated by the users is more safe to disable assignment operators.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.EnableReflection
member.summary: Enable reflection expression (like x.GetType().GetMethod() or typeof(double).Assembly) by removing the DisableReflectionVisitor.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.SetFunction(System.String,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Allow the specified function delegate to be called from a parsed expression.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.SetVariable(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Allow the specified variable to be used in a parsed expression.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.SetVariable(System.String,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Allow the specified variable to be used in a parsed expression.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.SetExpression(System.String,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Allow the specified Expression to be used in a parsed expression. Basically add the specified expression as a known identifier.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.SetIdentifiers(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DynamicExpresso.Identifier})
member.summary: Allow the specified list of identifiers to be used in a parsed expression. Basically add the specified expressions as a known identifier.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.SetIdentifier(DynamicExpresso.Identifier)
member.summary: Allow the specified identifier to be used in a parsed expression. Basically add the specified expression as a known identifier.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Reference(System.Type)
member.summary: Allow the specified type to be used inside an expression. The type will be available using its name. If the type contains method extensions methods they will be available inside expressions.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Reference(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DynamicExpresso.ReferenceType})
member.summary: Allow the specified type to be used inside an expression. See Reference(Type, string) method.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Reference(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Allow the specified type to be used inside an expression by using a custom alias. If the type contains extensions methods they will be available inside expressions.
member.param: Public name that must be used in the expression.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Reference(DynamicExpresso.ReferenceType)
member.summary: Allow the specified type to be used inside an expression by using a custom alias. If the type contains extensions methods they will be available inside expressions.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Parse(System.String,DynamicExpresso.Parameter[])
member.summary: Parse a text expression and returns a Lambda class that can be used to invoke it.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Parse(System.String,System.Type,DynamicExpresso.Parameter[])
member.summary: Parse a text expression and returns a Lambda class that can be used to invoke it. If the expression cannot be converted to the type specified in the expressionType parameter an exception is throw.
member.param: The expected return type. Use void or object type if there isn't an expected return type.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.ParseAsDelegate``1(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Parse a text expression and convert it into a delegate.
member.param: Names of the parameters. If not specified the parameters names defined inside the delegate are used.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.ParseAsExpression``1(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Parse a text expression and convert it into a lambda expression.
member.param: Names of the parameters. If not specified the parameters names defined inside the delegate are used.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Eval(System.String,DynamicExpresso.Parameter[])
member.summary: Parse and invoke the specified expression.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Eval``1(System.String,DynamicExpresso.Parameter[])
member.summary: Parse and invoke the specified expression.

member.name: M:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Eval(System.String,System.Type,DynamicExpresso.Parameter[])
member.summary: Parse and invoke the specified expression.
member.param: The return type of the expression. Use void or object if you don't know the expected return type.

member.name: P:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.ReferencedTypes
member.summary: Gets a list of registeres types. Add types by using the Reference method.

member.name: P:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.Identifiers
member.summary: Gets a list of known identifiers. Add identifiers using SetVariable, SetFunction or SetExpression methods.

member.name: P:DynamicExpresso.Interpreter.AssignmentOperators
member.summary: Gets the available assignment operators.

member.name: T:DynamicExpresso.Parameter
member.summary: An expression parameter. This class is thread safe.
